articles.author: Ana Diaz
articles.title: Minecraft’s launch page pays tribute to Technoblade
articles.description: Minecraft’s loading page now includes a crowned pig, which is a tribute to the avatar of the late YouTuber Technoblade, who died June 30 following a battle with cancer.
articles.content: Minecraft fans logging into the survival and sandbox game may have noticed a slight difference on its opening page. The launchers splash art now shows a crowned pig in the top right corner. Its a tri… [+1505 chars]

articles.author: Owen S. Good
articles.title: No more Xbox 360 Games with Gold in October, says Microsoft
articles.description: In a message to Xbox Live Gold subscribers sent in July, Microsoft said that the nine-year old Games With Gold benefit would stop offering Xbox 360 games in October 2022.
articles.content:
Bad news. Orisit? Either way, come October, Xbox Live Games with Gold will no longer offer Xbox 360 titles. Thats according to a message Xbox Live Gold subscribers are now finding in their inboxes.
… [+1800 chars]

articles.author: Austen Goslin
articles.title: The first Clerks III trailer swallows its own tail
articles.description: Clerks is back, with a third movie from writer-director Kevin Smith. The latest sequel reunites original Clerks characters Dante, Randal, Jay, and Silent Bob as they make their own movie. Coming to theaters in fall 2022.
articles.content: It looks dated and retro, but given the self-referential jokes about the franchises past, thats probably the point

articles.author: Austen Goslin
articles.title: The Amsterdam trailer stars everyone from Christian Bale to Taylor Swift
articles.description: The Amsterdam trailer showcases a 1930s murder mystery with a massive cast, including Christian Bale, Margot Robbie, Robert De Niro, and Mike Myers. It’s the first film since 2015 from Silver Linings Playbook’s David O. Russell, whose history of controversy i…
articles.content: The first trailer for David O. Russells return to filmmaking features Margot Robbie and John David Washington

articles.author: Owen S. Good
articles.title: Ubisoft reveals Tom Clancy’s The Division Resurgence, a F2P mobile game
articles.description: Tom Clancy’s The Division Resurgence, an upcoming free-to-play mobile game, was announced on July 5, 2022, and it will launch soon on iOS and Android devices. Ubisoft is now taking registrations for a closed alpha of the game.
articles.content: The next game in Ubisofts Tom Clancys The Division series is for mobile devices. Tom Clancys The Division Resurgence, announced on Wednesday, is a canon opus, the publisher said in a statement. The f… [+2815 chars]

articles.author: Cass Marshall
articles.title: Wild Rift’s Shining Bright patch adds more League of Legends champions
articles.description: Patch 3.3, Shining Bright, adds a host of content to the League of Legends mobile game Wild Rift. Players will be able to unlock Kassadin, Sion, and Samira, as well as the new Star Guardian skins.
articles.content: Patch 3.3 is chock full of content

articles.author: Austen Goslin
articles.title: Stranger Things creators making new live-action Death Note for Netflix
articles.description: Stranger Things creators, the Duffer brothers, have started a new studio that will oversee a live-action Death Note series, an adaptation of Stephen King and and Peter Straub’s The Talisman, and a new Stranger Things spinoff for Netflix.
articles.content: The Duffer brothers, the creators behind Stranger Things, have started a new production company, Upside Down Pictures, and are already working on a handful of new projects at Netflix, Deadline report… [+1881 chars]

articles.author: Austen Goslin
articles.title: Amazon’s Lord of the Rings: Rings of Power series gets short new teaser
articles.description: The Rings of Power, Amazon’s upcoming Lord of the Rings series, has a short new teaser trailer exclusive to Amazon Prime Video members. The trailer shows off new and returning characters, as well as the vistas of Middle-earth
articles.content:
Amazon Primes biggest show gets another cryptic preview

articles.author: Toussaint Egan
articles.title: Deus Ex writer Mary DeMarle working on new Mass Effect sequel

articles.content: The next installment in the Mass Effect series is getting some help from one of the minds behind the Deus Ex series. BioWare project director Michael Gamble revealed on Twitter on Monday that Mary De… [+1145 chars]

articles.author: Owen S. Good
articles.title: NBA 2K23 brings back The Jordan Challenge after 12 years
articles.description: NBA 2K23 launches Sept. 9 for PlayStation, Xbox, PC and Nintendo Switch; it will bring back The Jordan Challenge, last seen in NBA 2K11, and give it five extra games for players to re-create.
articles.content:
NBA 2K23 launches Sept. 9 and it will bring back The Jordan Challenge, an extremely popular mode that nonetheless has made just one appearance, 12 years ago in 2K Sports landmark NBA 2K11.
The Jorda… [+2395 chars]
